DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate whether an ultrathin endoscope will improve a patient's tolerance during the procedure. In addition, this study will look at whether local pharyngeal anaesthesia is necessary during ultrathin endoscopy.
DOC.brief_title: Ultrathin Versus Conventional Esophagogastroduodenoscopy in Unsedated Patient With or Without Local Pharyngeal Anaesthesia
DOC.criteria: Aged between 1870 Previous experience of upper endoscopy Allergy to local pharyngeal anaesthesia Patient requesting sedation during endoscopy
